articles.title: The Juggler: The Story Behind the Iconic Dick Allen Cover of 1972 - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: Former MVP Dick Allen, who died earlier this week, appeared on the cover of SI in June 1972. This is the story behind a quintessential image of 1970s MLB.
